name: The Deep Ones (jorgegx00)
description:
Fight your way between difficult enemies, unlock useful abilities, and survive awesome boss fights!

The game is not completed and is missing mechanics, animations and bosses.

I did all the programming and my Brother all the art(Animations, sprites, tilesheets, GUI). Everything in 15 days!

We only got time to finish 3 bosses. but there are more bosses, enemies and scenarios that are half done and could be implemented in the future.

FAQ:
1 - How to exit the game?

ALT+F4, we didn't got time for a pause menu, after the JAM is finish we will update the game with other features.
2 - What about my progress?

The game has auto save, every time you defeat a boss or touch a shrine(the statues) the game will be saved.

3 - How I activate objects?

You only need to hit them, later we are going to add an interaction command.

**The use of a gamepad is recommended**

Basic Controls 

[Keyboard] /( Gamepad)

Move: [WASD] /  (D-PAD)

Jump: [SPACE] / (A)

Dodge: [K] / (B)

**SPOILERS**

Dash: [SHIFT] / (RT)

Claw Attacks: [I] / (Y)

CREDITS:

Music used:

"Unlight", "Final Count",  "Clash Defiant",  "Achilles",  "Shadowlands 1 - Horizon"

Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
